trans-unit.source: Describes the behavior that caused a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> event for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Descrive il comportamento che ha provocato l’evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.

trans-unit.source: The page buttons are not visible as buttons, but they occupy the space between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls on either end of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Pulsanti della pagina non sono visibili come pulsanti, ma occupano lo spazio tra il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controlli in delle estremità del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.

trans-unit.source: The user clicks a page button when clicking the left mouse button between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>.
trans-unit.target: L'utente fa clic su un pulsante di pagina quando si fa clic sul pulsante sinistro del mouse tra il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>.

trans-unit.source: The result of this action is to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> in the direction of the page button.
trans-unit.target: Il risultato dell'azione consiste nello spostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> nella direzione del pulsante pagina.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the effect of the page buttons, see the descriptions of the LargeIncrement and LargeDecrement members.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'effetto dei pulsanti della pagina, vedere le descrizioni dei membri LargeIncrement e LargeDecrement.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, including the page buttons.
trans-unit.target: La figura seguente mostra gli elementi di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, inclusi i pulsanti della pagina.

trans-unit.source: ![The different parts of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "The different parts of a ScrollBar")
trans-unit.target: ![Le diverse parti di una barra di scorrimento](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "le diverse parti di una barra di scorrimento")

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> was dragged to a new position and is now no longer being dragged by the user.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> è stato trascinato in una nuova posizione e non può essere trascinato ulteriormente dall’utente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum" /> position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> è stato spostato alla posizione <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the CTRL+HOME keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale, questo movimento si verifica quando vengono premuti i tasti CTRL+HOME.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToTopCommand" /> in a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> and a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToLeftEndCommand" /> in a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo movimento corrisponde al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToTopCommand" /> nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale e al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToLeftEndCommand" /> nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" />, to the left for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> or upward for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> viene spostato a una distanza specificata, determinata dal valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" />, verso sinistra per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> orizzontale o verso l’alto per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the page button that is above the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> is pressed, or when the PAGE UP key is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageUpCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale, questo movimento si verifica quando viene premuto il pulsante della pagina che si trova sopra il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> o quando viene premuto il tasto PGSU e corrisponde al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageUpCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the page button to the left of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageLeftCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> orizzontale, questo movimento si verifica quando viene premuto il pulsante della pagina che si trova a sinistra del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> e corrisponde al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageLeftCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" />, to the right for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> or downward for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> viene spostato a una distanza specificata, determinata dal valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" />, verso destra per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> orizzontale o verso il basso per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the page button that is below the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> is pressed, or when the PAGE DOWN key is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageDownCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale, questo movimento si verifica quando viene premuto il pulsante della pagina che si trova sotto il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> o quando viene premuto il tasto PGGIÙ e corrisponde al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageDownCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the page button to the right of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageRightCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> orizzontale, questo movimento si verifica quando viene premuto il pulsante della pagina che si trova a destra del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> e corrisponde al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageRightCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum" /> position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> è stato spostato alla posizione <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the CTRL+END keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale, questo movimento si verifica quando vengono premuti i tasti CTRL+FINE.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToEndCommand" /> in a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> and a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToRightEndCommand" /> in a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo movimento corrisponde al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToEndCommand" /> nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale e al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToRightEndCommand" /> nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" />, to the left for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> or upward for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> viene spostato a una distanza ridotta, determinata dal valore della proprietà di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" />, verso destra per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> orizzontale o verso il basso per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the upper <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed or when the UP ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineUpCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale, questo movimento si verifica quando viene premuto il pulsante <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> superiore o quando viene premuto il tasto FRECCIA SU e corrisponde al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineUpCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the left <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineLeftCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> orizzontale, questo movimento si verifica quando viene premuto il pulsante <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> di sinistra e corrisponde al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineLeftCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" />, to the right for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> or downward for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> viene spostato a una distanza ridotta, determinata dal valore di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" /> verso destra per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> orizzontale o verso il basso per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the lower <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed or when the DOWN ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineDownCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> verticale, questo movimento si verifica quando viene premuto il pulsante <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> inferiore o quando viene premuto il tasto FRECCIA GIÙ e corrisponde al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineDownCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the right <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineRightCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Per il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> orizzontale, questo movimento si verifica quando viene premuto il pulsante <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> di destra e corrisponde al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineRightCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved to a new position because the user selected **Scroll Here** in the shortcut menu of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> è stato spostato in una nuova posizione, perché l'utente ha scelto **Scorri fino a qui** dal menu di scelta rapida del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollHereCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo movimento corrisponde al comando <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollHereCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: To view the shortcut menu, right-click the mouse when the pointer is over the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Per visualizzare il menu di scelta rapida, fare clic con il pulsante destro del mouse quando il puntatore è sul controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> was dragged and caused a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> è stato trascinato e ha provocato un evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> event of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType" /> may occur more than one time when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> is dragged in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Un evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> di questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType" /> può verificarsi più di una volta quando il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> viene trascinato nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
